name: PharmApp
tagline: data's management content application for drugs.
body:
In order to watch source code : [PharmApp's Repository](https://github.com/miagebdx/pharmApp/)

# Download

1. `git clone https://github.com/miagebdx/pharmApp.git`
2. `make all`
3. `cd Build && ./mainTerm`

# Gui Version

**Warning** : Need GTK & GTKmm library v3.0

1. `git checkout dev-gui`
2. `make mainGui`
3. `cd Build && ./mainGui`

The binary file are located on the __build__ folder.


# Report

Find [here](https://miagebdx.github.io/pharmApp/images/rapport.pdf)
google: pharmacie, application, c++, gtkmm, gtk, c, bash, drugs, app, miage, bordeaux, POO, Bordeaux MIAGE
